title: Trist Location Insights App Crosses the 2000 Downloads Mark
text:
August 31, 2015 at 17:07 PM EDT Trist Location Insights App Crosses the 2000 Downloads Mark Trist is on a roll as the location insights app crosses the 2000 downloads milestone. 
Trist, arguably the most popular location insights app today, has crossed yet another major milestone. The app has hit the 2000 downloads mark and continues to be the most dependable app in the location insights niche. Trist offers a location-based, community-sourced app for smartphones, providing users with location insights in real time and with a high level of accuracy. 
“We are delighted to share the news that Trist has crossed the 2000 downloads mark recently,” says spokesperson for gotrist.com, the app’s official Website. “The relatively short period of time between hitting 1000 downloads and crossing the 2000 mark clearly shows Trist that continues to be a raging favorite in its category. The unstinted user faith in Trist is due to the fact it is easy to use and it updates data with real-time information. Trist provides fresh and relevant information which can be useful in finding worthwhile venues for users.” 
Trist is a hyper-local social platform where people looking for activities team together with other like-minded users. The app helps users to decide where they should go for a perfect evening with a compatible crowd. Trist makes planning nights out easy , providing all the information needed to locate places conforming to user tastes. Users can find where and with whom they would love to be without wasting any time. 
Trist has certainly captured the imagination of today’s generation as it helps them find reliable and updated information about the hottest venues, services and events. The app makes finding a new place and moving around easy and comfortable. Trist is must-have app for those looking for the trendiest spots and events in a new city. Users can get all the information they need easily and quickly. With Trist, they can thrust aside unwanted data and remain focused on things they want to do. 
The growing popularity of Trist can also be attributed to the fact that it helps users make the right decisions quickly, saving time, money and frustration. They can pick a place that’s piqued their interest without the risk of disappointment, because detailed and updated information is available right at their fingertips. 
Trist is a highly valuable tool not just for individual users but for businesses as well. According to the Trist spokesperson, enterprise owners can use the app to choose the best location to maximize output. They can use Trist to identify locations with the highest business potential for specific brands, products, and services. 
With its 2000 plus downloads, Trist has now established itself as a clear leader in the location insights domain. The developers of this innovative technology are confident that the app will hit more milestones in the near future. 
For more information, visit http://www.gotrist.com 
About Trist: 
Trist is a free-to-download location insights app available on iTunes and Google Play in the Lifestyle category. The app has been developed by Trist and Fikl, LLC and available in version 2.2.2 in English. The 22.0 MB app requires iOS 7.0 or later and is compatible with iPhone, iPad, and iPod touch in addition to devices running on Android. Trist is optimized for iPhone 5, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus as well as the latest Android versions.
